amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the language that would repeal EPA's scientific finding that carbon pollution endangers the public health and welfare.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 112-680 to strike the language that would repeal EPA's scientific finding that carbon pollution endangers the public health and welfare.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 229 (Roll no. 593).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 229 (Roll no. 593).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Waxman.
